name: Omelette di riso
desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The evenly beaten egg fluids are fried into half-doneness before being poured out on top of the rice, and tomato ketchup is drizzled over top afterward once it is ready to plate up. They say that this dish was derived from another region, though this version involves a more complicated cooking method.

customize.name: Ricetta: omelette di riso
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Omelette Rice.

customize.name: Uovo d'uccello
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Riso
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Pomodoro
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Zucchero
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Omelette di riso deliziosa
customize.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. Gently poking at the outer layer of the egg skin, which is not wholly cooked yet wraps itself and its red ketchup crown around the tightly packed white rice, shall prick the appetite of any customer â€” and after they have partaken joyfully, they cannot help but smile.

customize.name: Omelette di riso sospetta
customize.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The egg skin just about barely covers the rice, and it has been fried for so long that it has lost all fluidity. Might as well call it "fried egg on rice."

customize.name: Kuki Shinobu
customize.desc: La capace e affidabile vice capo della Banda di Arataki. Ricorda: capace e affidabile non sono aggettivi che generalmente si addicono ai membri della Banda di Arataki, ma solo ed esclusivamente alla loro vice capo.

customize.name: Valzer Omurice
customize.desc: Kuki Shinobu's specialty. The soft egg skin almost seems to dance upon a stage made from sauce, with fluffy rice wrapped under its swaying skirt. This would even be a match for the work of Uyuu Restaurant's head chef. Truly, Shinobu's chef license was not earned in vain.

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
